meanings.definition: An eating disorder characterized by binge eating followed by purging.
meanings.sent1: Her bulimia caused her to eat large amounts of food and then make herself vomit.
meanings.sent2: Bulimia can have serious health consequences if not treated.
meanings.sent3: Sarah's bulimia made her the fastest eater in the group.
meanings.sent4: The city's bulimia for new buildings led to rapid urban development.
meanings.sent5: The bulimia of the river eroded the riverbank over time.

meanings.definition: The act of binge eating followed by purging.
meanings.sent1: After experiencing bulimia, she felt guilty about her eating habits.
meanings.sent2: Bulimia involves cycles of overeating and then getting rid of the food.
meanings.sent3: The bulimia of the raccoon raiding the trash cans amused the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The bulimia of spending and saving money quickly drained his bank account.
meanings.sent5: The bulimia of the storm caused flooding in the streets.
